snippet.title: Seven Seas: Adventures - Alpha Gameplayer Trailer
snippet.description:
Follow on Kickstarter: https://7se.as/kickstarter
Wishlist on Steam: https://7se.as/steam
Chat on Discord: https://7se.as/discord

Ahoy Captain!

Get ready to chart a course and set sail in Seven Seas: Adventures! An open world RPG set during the golden ages of Sail & Piracy.

Player take control over their very own fleet, and in their adventures they can explore 37 unique ports, interact with over 100 characters aligned with 9 historical factions.

Sail with your friends in multiplayer, or compete with other players from all over the world in conquering ports, trade routes, and much more!

Fans of games like Sid Meier's Pirates, Tradewinds, Mount & Blade, and more will find much to enjoy within Seven Seas: Adventures!
